LanguageData.VUIE.Architect.GroupDisplay.SquareGrid.D: Keep normal gizmo size, display a small grid of options
LanguageData.VUIE.Architect.GroupDisplay.ExpandGrid.D: Keep grid with a max height of 2, expand width to fit
LanguageData.VUIE.Architect.GroupDisplay.Vanilla.Desc: Display icon of last used inner gizmo
LanguageData.VUIE.Architect.LeftClick.Desc: Open selection menu on left click, by default selects the current mousedover item
LanguageData.VUIE.Misc.ShowImpact.Desc: In the tooltip when hovering over a pawn's capacity (breathing, moving, etc.), also show how much each item contributes to the capacity.
LanguageData.VUIE.Overlays.ShowNumbers.Desc: If false, show colored cells like the fertility overlay. If true, show numbers near the cursor like the vanilla beauty overlay.
LanguageData.VUIE.Overlays.UseColor.Desc: If false, color will be between green and red, the brighter it is the more green.
LanguageData.VUIE.Debug.HideNotMatch: Hide items that don't match search
LanguageData.VUIE.Architect.Disabled.NotPlaying: Architect Configuration Disabled: Must be in-game to edit.
LanguageData.VUIE.Architect.Disabled.Vanilla: Architect Configuration Disabled: Cannot edit the vanilla configuration.
LanguageData.VUIE.Architect.Gather.Desc: Find all designators that are not present in the current configuration and add them here.
LanguageData.VUIE.ConfirmRestart.Desc: This action requires a restart of the game. Restart now?
LanguageData.VUIE.ModCompat.TD.Desc: Disable the overlays system in TD Enhancement Pack in favor of the ones in Vanilla UI Expanded. Requires restart to take effect.
LanguageData.VUIE.Debug.HideNotMatch.Desc: By default, RimWorld simply highlights search matches in debug action menus. With this setting on, they will instead be completely hidden. May increase performance when searching with lots of options.
